title: New client keep disconnecting, can't play anymore
body:
Ever since the new client launched I've ket getting disconnections from the client and haven't been able to start games since I get disconnected in champion select and kicked out of the game. I have tried everything in the connection issues page on your site but nothing works. The legacy client was working all fine so I used it until you officially launched the new one. I am not the only one experiencing this issue and the only answear you give people is that they should try everything in your troubleshooting connection issues page. 

Are you aware of this problem? Are you aware of any solution for this exact problem? Are you working on a fix on this problem since it's been a problem since the launh of the new client?

replies.body:
If your network was able to work fine on the legacy version but not the updated, then a setting may be blocking you from reaching our servers.  Try auto-configuring your firewall settings automatically with our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367).

If that doesn't work, grab the logs provided by the HRT and attach them to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our tech team can dig into this with you and help find the cause.
